description: CISA and the FBI confirmed that Chinese hackers compromised the "private communications" of a "limited number" of government officials after breaching multiple U.S. broadband providers. [...]
title: US govt officials’ communications compromised in recent telecom hack

description: The business contact information for 122 million people circulating since February 2024 is now confirmed to have been stolen from a B2B demand generation platform. [...]
title: Leaked info of 122 million linked to B2B data aggregator breach

description: Suspected Russian hackers were caught exploiting a recently patched Windows vulnerability as a zero-day in ongoing attacks targeting Ukrainian entities. [...]
title: Microsoft patches Windows zero-day exploited in attacks on Ukraine

description: The Department of Justice has unsealed the indictment against two suspected Snowflake hackers, who breached more than 165 organizations using the services of the Snowflake cloud storage company. [...]
title: US indicts Snowflake hackers who extorted $2.5 million from 3 victims

description: ​Attackers now target a critical severity vulnerability with publicly available exploit code that affects multiple models of end-of-life D-Link network-attached storage (NAS) devices. [...]
title: Critical bug in EoL D-Link NAS devices now exploited in attacks

description: Google is adding a new AI-powered scam protection feature that monitors phone call conversations on Google Pixel devices to detect patterns that warn when the caller may be a scammer. [...]
title: New Google Pixel AI feature analyzes phone conversations for scams

description: Bitdefender has released a decryptor for the 'ShrinkLocker' ransomware strain, which uses Windows' built-in BitLocker drive encryption tool to lock victim's files. [...]
title: New ShrinkLocker ransomware decryptor recovers BitLocker password
